{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.03224v1", "title": "Analytic continuation of Kochubei multiple polylogarithms and its
  applications", "summary": "In the present paper, we propose an analytic continuation of Kochubei
multiple polylogarithms using the techniques developed by Furusho. Moreover, we
produce a family of linear relations and a linear independence result for
values of our analytically continued Kochubei polylogarithms at algebraic
elements from a cohomological aspect.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-05-06T06:30:45Z"}
